resources.string: 1) Measure Heart Rate using your camera\n2) Measure Respiratory rate using your device accelerometer
Record up to ten different symptoms like Fever, cough, shortness of breath, etc.
Lie down and place phone on your chest before pressing check button. Your breathing rate will be recorded for 45 seconds.
Select a symtom from drop-down list and corresponding rating.

!!WARNING - Please provide storage permission before measuring heart rate!!

 When click on check button camera window will open. Turn on flash and place your finger covering flash and camera lens. 
 Do not press finger tightly on lens. For accurate reading record video for 45 secs.
